name: Nevedomo
description:
Nevedomo is a dynamic arena first-person shooter with a Zetlex robot.
Future. Two warring factions Rockets and Bullets participate in deadly competitions under the leadership of the Texer Force Corporation in order to capture the world's resources.Have a good fight!

4 types of weapons: Dexgun, Ballgun, Rocketgun, Grenader

Levels
Barrels
Kill 100 enemies
Black Hole
Roll 5 yellow barrels into a black hole in 400 seconds
Shootball
Beat the Rockets soccer team in 300 seconds

Attention!
There are blood, violence and explosions
